project.name: F3 Compiler
project.description: Builds, tests, and runs the f3-compiler project.
project.fail:
: ${build.defs} does not exist.
Your f3-compiler repo must be under the top level repository, ${top-repo}. You should do this: cd .. hg clone ${top-url} mv f3-compiler ${top-repo}
And then, you must create the ${top-repo}/import/ directory containing all the external packages that are needed to build: download file import.zip from http://kenai.com/projects/f3-compiler/downloads cp ...../import.zip . cd ${top-repo} ant import
You don't really have to download import.zip. If it does not exist, then the 'ant import' command will use http to fetch all the needed packages. But, this is slow and prone to timeouts.
After doing the above, you can cd f3-compiler and do your build.
